bibl.bibl: Milne, David. 1847. On the parallel roads of Lochaber, with remarks on the change of relative levels of sea and land in Scotland, and on the detrital deposits in that country. [Read 1 March and 5 April 1847.] Transactions of the Royal Society of Edinburgh 16 (1849): 395–418. [Also printed in Edinburgh New Philosophical Journal 43 (1847): 339–64.]
